plays.text: Penalty to Scott Hannan 2 minutes for High Sticking Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Chris Drury 2 minutes for Holding Niklas Sundstrom
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Tripping Scott Thornton
Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Peter Forsberg 2 minutes for Roughing Marcus Ragnarsson
Penalty to Vincent Damphousse 2 minutes for Slashing Milan Hejduk
Goal scored by Marcus Ragnarsson assisted by Niklas Sundstrom and Mike Ricci
Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Martin Skoula
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Holding Brad Larsen
Goal scored by Peter Forsberg assisted by Joe Sakic and Milan Hejduk
